install.sql: CREATE TABLE `{prefix}newsletter_subscribers` ( `id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `date` datetime NOT NULL, `fullname` varchar(50) NULL, `email` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `topics` text NOT NULL, `token` char(32) NOT NULL, `last_sent` timestamp NOT NULL, `status` enum('active', 'inactive') NOT NULL default 'inactive', UNIQUE `EMAIL` (`email`), PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) {mysql_version};

CREATE TABLE `{prefix}newsletter_messages` ( `id` mediumint(7) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `from_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `from_mail` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `subj` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `body` text NOT NULL, `html` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL, `active` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL default 1, `total` mediumint(7) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) {mysql_version};

CREATE TABLE `{prefix}newsletter_messages_archive` ( `id` mediumint(7) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `from_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `from_mail` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `date_added` datetime NOT NULL, `subj` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `body` text NOT NULL, `html` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL, `active` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL default 1, `total` mediumint(7) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) {mysql_version};
